name: vesta

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
VESTA is a 3D visualization program for structural models, volumetric
data such as electron/nuclear densities, and crystal morphologies.

dependencies.name: gtkplus
dependencies.description:
The GTK+ package contains libraries used for creating graphical user
interfaces for applications.

dependencies.name: mesa
dependencies.description:
Mesa is an open-source implementation of the OpenGL specification - a
system for rendering interactive 3D graphics.

dependencies.name: cairo
dependencies.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.
